dt2.5:1.1_0: Rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā,
dt2.5:1.1_1: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā,
dt2.5:1.1_2: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?
dt2.5:1.2_0: Te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:2.3_0: saṅkhārakkhandhena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:2.4_0: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:3.6_0: manindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:3.7_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:4.4_0: phoṭṭhabbadhātuyā ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:4.5_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:5.5_0: jīvitindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:5.6_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:6.3_0: nirodhasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:6.4_0: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:7.2_0: kāyindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:7.3_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:8.15_0: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:8.16_0: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:9.1_0: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:9.2_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:10.1_0: Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:10.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:11.1_0: Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:11.2_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:12.5_0: kammabhavena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:12.6_0: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:13.4_0: iddhipādena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:13.5_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:14.5_0: maraṇena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:14.6_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:15.1_0: Paridevena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:15.2_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:16.18_0: manasikārena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:16.19_0: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:17.1_0: Cittena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:17.2_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:19.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:19.2_0: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:19.3_0: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā ….
dt2.5:35.3_0: ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:35.4_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:36.2_0: anidassanasappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:36.3_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:37.2_0: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:37.3_0: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:37.4_0: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:38.3_0: sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:38.4_0: hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:38.5_0: na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:38.6_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:39.2_0: asaṅkhatehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:39.3_0: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:40.2_0: sappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:40.3_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:41.1_0: Rūpīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:41.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:42.2_0: lokuttarehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:42.3_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:43.2_0: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:43.3_0: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:43.4_0: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:44.3_0: āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:44.4_0: āsavavippayuttehi anāsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:44.5_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:45.7_0: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:45.8_0: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:46.4_0: sārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:46.5_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:47.9_0: upādādhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:47.10_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:48.1_0: Cittehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:48.2_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:49.6_0: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:49.7_0: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:50.1_0: Ajjhattikehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:50.2_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:51.3_0: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:51.4_0: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:51.5_0: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:51.6_0: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:52.4_0: saṅkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:52.5_0: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:52.24_0: saraṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā,
dt2.5:52.24_1: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā,
dt2.5:52.24_2: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?
dt2.5:52.25_0: Te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
